citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
(c) IACUC Functions.
* The last IACUC meeting and program review was in May 2013 (ten months ago).
** It is important for the IACUC to conduct regular reviews of the program to ensure that it is in compliance with the
Animal Welfare Act.
*** The registrant must ensure that the IACUC reviews, at least once every six months, the program for humane
care and use of animals. TO BE CORRECTED BY: 30 April 2014.

citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
(c) IACUC Functions.
* The last IACUC meeting and facility inspection was in May 2013 (ten months ago).
** It is important for the IACUC to conduct regular inspections of the facility to ensure the health and welfare of the
animals.
*** The registrant must ensure that the IACUC inspects, at least once every six months, all the animal facilities. TO
BE CORRECTED BY: 30 April 2014.
The inspection and an exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
